original_text: The Israelites were in the Sinai desert. It was the first day of the second month of the second year after they left Egypt. Moses was in the Tent of Meeting.
korean_text: 이스라엘 자손이 애굽 땅에서 나온 후 둘째 해 둘째 달 첫째 날에 여호와께서 시내 광야 회막에서 모세에게 말씀하여 이르시되

sentences.original_text: The Israelites were in the Sinai desert.
It was the first day of the second month
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 두 번째 달의 첫째 날이었습니다

sentences.original_text: of the second year after they left Egypt.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 이집트를 떠난 후 두 번째 해의.

sentences.original_text: Moses was in the Tent of Meeting.
